Title: 2. Stakeholders
Write-Up Text: People took to social media to express their thoughts on Australiaâ€™s economic inclusion advisory committee's recommendation on raising the rate payments to reduce poverty. The general sentiment among posters was that the government must act on this recommendation in the upcoming budget by supportably increasing these payments. Many posters expressed their frustration over the inadequacy of current payments which could barely help people cover their cost of essentials.
